data.title: Usher Raymond Research Paper - 915 Words
data.text:
How much do you know about Usher Raymond? Did you know that he was born on October 14, 1978, and had released his first album in 1994 at the age of 15 and continued on, cause I know I didn’t know that. Also Usher’s songs have constantly landed on the chart and earned several Grammys, people choice awards, and among other honors. He had sold up to 1 million copies of the album “ Confessions” in the first week it got released.

(biography.om). Usher Raymond was born on “October 14, 1978 in Chattanooga, Tennessee”, he had entered his celebrity days at the age of 14, two years after he had moved in with his mom and his only sibling brother in Atlanta. After recording at “ Star Search” he had landed a recording contract and released his first album in 1994 …show more content…

And he’s pointing out that some hobbies can get you somewhere big in life like singing or dancing. I think he’s an inspiring person for just who he is, for becoming someone with just his voice at the age of 14. I also believe Usher is trying to prove that doing what makes you happy makes you go a long way by just believing, being positive, and moving forward and great support. Some say that he is a negative influence just for who he is and I can’t argue with it cause I do not know much about Usher or any of the bad things he has done in his life, but I still believe Usher is a positive person who has worked hard in life to get him where he is today. Usher is his own person and i agree that people shouldn’t judge him. People possibly just say he’s a negative person just for his race or how he looks, but people are just quick to assume then instead of reading about him. Usher has an effect on some people. He has the effect on guys to become singers, more like to inspire people to become singers and live their dream. The effect it has on me is for me to become myself and go straight forward with my hobbies and dreams. He has an effect on some people, but not all and the effect isn’t the same with
